Dekker his dreame In which, beeing rapt with a poeticall enthusiasme, the great volumes of heauen and hell to him were opened, in which he read many wonderfull things. Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
[8], 37, [3] p.
Printed by Nicholas Okes, London : 1620.
In verse. With a title-page woodcut. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
